website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive manual massaging stick can go to work on sore leg muscles right away. We also like its versatility and portability. Much less expensive.
pros: Extremely portable, so can be used immediately after workout
Works well on many parts of the body
cons: Rollers can separate during use, creating pinch points
Not designed for lymphatic or circulatory issues

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to "The Stick"!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and have loved it. I was trying to decide between this and "The Stick" that was more expensive, but I honestly think I like this more. People complained about it pulling out their leg hair, but if you're a guy with long leg hair any roller you use will do that. I usually roll over my exercise pants anyway. I've used it a ton and it really helps break up my muscle soreness and it's easy to throw in a duffle. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Marie Bradley

customer_reviews.title: It helps a little
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with calf cramping especially after working out or if I forget to drink enough water and this seems to help a bit. Not the best feeling massage you'll ever get and is all hard plastic so can hurt if you put too much pressure. Seems to be built well so I don't think durability will be an issue. I guess it's what I expected, not a miracle worker but helps stretch out the muscles a bit when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It's compact and easy to use with great results.
customer_reviews.text: I love this muscle roller. It's light and easy to maneuver. I have been having pain in my knee and the roller is great for working my thigh muscles and calf muscles. My physical therapist recommended that I use one of these rollers and I 'm glad he did. I am also using it for other areas, neck to shoulder area and also buttocks etc. It's a great addition to my other massage and fitness items. I am going to check out the Fitness Room strengthening bands also.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Don't love it - the rollers on the muscle stick don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't love it - the rollers on the muscle stick don't smoothly work together, and thus, it feels like I'm just dragging the muscle roller up and down my shin/calf/leg, pulling the hair out as I go. I would suggest a different brand/model - I have a GoFit roller that works 10 times better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haefs

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: My husband has progressed from marathons to ultra marathons, so we have started needing this. I am also a physical therapist so I have experience with these. What I like in particular about this one is that it rolls like a rolling pin but because it has individual pieces, I can use it on smaller muscle groups. It is more precise. I was worried the individual pieces would get caught in his leg hair, but they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is so great and helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is so great and helpful. My 15-year-old son has a muscle sprain and soreness on his right hip and pelvic area and with using this muscle roller for about three days he felt better and went on to win second place in districts!!! I will gladly suggest that anyone who works out or plays sports has this roller in their possession at all times. He takes it to practice everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Zhy’on Scott

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: My sister advised me to get this roller, due to pulling a calf muscle...the injury occurred 2 days prior, I tried numerous things to decrease the soreness, nothing worked...when I received this roller and used it, the muscle relaxed and pain decreased...I highly recommend this for lifters(I lift and strength train), all people who workout!
customer_reviews.author: Ade O. Ogunmokun

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The muscle roller is exactly what I expected. Its high quality and was packaged safely. It arrived in promptly. I'm very happy with my purchase, I would buy from The Fitness Room on Amazon again and I recommend it to everyone. Thank you for this opportunity to provide feedback. Best of luck with your business. Using this roller on my tired knotted muscles is amazing. Its just what I needed to help with rehabbing muscles that had atrophied because of a spine issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robin L. Messick

customer_reviews.title: and fits nicely in his golf bag
customer_reviews.text: I am a personal trainer with 33 years in the fitness and wellness industry. I ordered this stick for one of my clients. He is an avid golfer in his 70’s with very tight muscles. This product was reasonably priced, arrived on time, and fits nicely in his golf bag! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Simple and versatile tool for muscle soreness and tightness
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and works well for relieving muscle tightness. You can use this on your neck, lower back, this and calves. have a job that requires standing and walking. I use this before and after as part of my pain relief regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. 13

customer_reviews.title: The multiple knobs on the roller feel great. I was worried that the soft grip handles ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. The multiple knobs on the roller feel great. I was worried that the soft grip handles would get sticky and attract dirt, but no issues with that! I purchased and returned 2 rollers, all different styles prior to ordering this one and this is hands down the best roller I've tried! I would recommend this to anyone in the market for a roller!
customer_reviews.author: Bryana Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Versatile size and good value
customer_reviews.text: Wide at 18 inches. I'm using it to rehab my shoulder and easy to grasp and lift. I also use it to stretch out my calves every morning. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ohio snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Great relaxer
customer_reviews.text: I have stiff muscles mostly throughout my legs. I was told this could benefit me so I tried this one. While I cannot reach to help all areas, I am finding that rolling the muscle relaxer definitely has a loose effect. I was honestly surprised but if it works, great! Will continue rollator by along!
customer_reviews.author: Red hot squared

customer_reviews.title: Solid and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting used to but this thing works! You have to take some time but once it starts it really works to relieve pain. Solid build.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: This isn't a great product as it doesn't spin fluidly and the massage ...
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a great product as it doesn't spin fluidly and the massage nubs are somewhat painful. This product is inexpensive but not worth it in my book. Invest in a higher-grade unit. I opened up the package and the boxes they were in said "Made in China" and the quality was about what you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for....
customer_reviews.text: The one they used on me in physical therapy is wrapped in a soft foam that I find makes a difference when trying to massage tight muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a stick!
customer_reviews.text: I used a stick to try and roll out the knots and pains in my thigh, but this makes rolling out the pain less painful. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chance Smart

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used it as soon as I received it on my lower legs and back. Great for blood circulation and relieving sore muscles and legs from pain of neuropathy. I liked this better than taking a muscle relaxer. No side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: This muscle roller really works.
customer_reviews.text: This muscle roller has helped me a great deal. It has reduced my pain and I’m glad I bought it. The quality of this roller and the price is very good and I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cindy swatko

customer_reviews.title: We found it works good around the neck and shoulder blade area
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. we found that its easier to massage each other when lying on a massage table. We found it works good around the neck and shoulder blade area. Really works well for thighs, calves, hips, and lower back.
customer_reviews.author: dsc

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, portable, gets the job done. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Drose

customer_reviews.title: Eases sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: My trainer had me using a message stick after doing certain exercises or if I felt tight. I decided to get for home. This is a great device, feels good on tight/sore muscles and can easily be used on your neck sides, etc.
customer_reviews.author: M. Trail

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This massage stick is not very comfortable. There’s no padding on center area so it does not roll on shins well and is in fact very uncomfortable if you try it on anywhere that is not fleshy. It works on hamstring, calves etc,
customer_reviews.author: Ferentz Lafargue

customer_reviews.title: My legs thank you
customer_reviews.text: Moves great . Lightweight . Doesn’t look like an odd object laying around . Works great on my legs. Doesn’t press hard enough for my back but I would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My legs were hurting very badly after my workouts and my boxing trainer suggested this product. It works fantastic. It hurts when I first use it but it makes my muscles feel soooo much better!
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Watson

customer_reviews.title: Muscle Massages
customer_reviews.text: this product is fantastic and versatile. You can almost massage your whole body with it!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work properly. The rollers on the muscle stick do not work together and it feels like your dragging the muscle roller. Don’t buy this model. I wish I could return it
customer_reviews.author: Diana Fass

customer_reviews.title: Rigid but great size.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great roller and the size is perfect for travel. I just wish it had some flex to it, it is VERY rigid.
customer_reviews.author: K. McN

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed and fits perfectly in my duffle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Satty

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product; lightweight but sturdy and easy to use on my calf muscles and as a roller to loosen plantar muscles on feet. Price, quality and quick delivery- all awesome. Great job! Don't hesitate to order this.
customer_reviews.author: New England customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels Good
customer_reviews.text: Feels so good on my leg muscles before and after exercising. I go to P/T and they use something similar so I wanted to buy one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: As described and on quick standard delivery. Appears to be very well built and I believe it will last me a very long time. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: ... people and they told me that it works real good. I use it everyday and like it too

customer_reviews.title: Premium Muscle Roller
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as described, works great (I use it on my body every day & night), fast delivery, well worth the money, highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gettting pressure to the right spot
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a device that would let me isolate on specific leg part with a greater amount of pressure than I got with a foam roller. This roller meets my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dial

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: I recently started running and have experienced some muscle soreness in my legs. I use this before and after running as well as after other workouts and it has helped tremendously. I was skeptical that a plastic roller would really help but I’ve been very pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this roller. It has individual beads that roll independently from each other. Use it after work outs and I think I am less sore. I especially like using it on my lower back as a massager.
customer_reviews.author: RacineBelle

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice quality roller and does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quality roller and does the job, but does it come in a longer length? I'm unable to reach my shoulders and back of neck with this one. If I can exchange it for a longer one, I would like to do that? Thanks for your time, Kim
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and really allows you to relieve muscle tightness.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, versital, works great. Knocked out a plantar issue in two days. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use it on your shins......ouch.
customer_reviews.text: relieved leg pains and stopped my knees from hurting. Wife loves it on her back.
customer_reviews.author: claire c.

customer_reviews.title: My calves have always been super tight and I could never get a decent massage ...
customer_reviews.text: My calves have always been super tight and I could never get a decent massage to get rid of the knots and tightness. I used the muscle roller and man did that do the trick!! I could actually feel relief and the next day I was able to walk longer without feeling discomfort or a bit of pain. This product has helped me immensely!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable over spine
customer_reviews.text: Avoid rolling over spine because the rollers are a hard plastic. The firmness is good for muscles, but for some reason I thought the rollers would be a very firm rubber.
customer_reviews.author: LAD

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: It works well on sore muscles. I would definitely recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Knee surgery Aug '17 and still using it 8 months later. nice product

customer_reviews.title: Hard plastic and hurts when used.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard plastic and hurts my leg when used (even lightly). I would invest in the rubber-nubbed ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Keep using it, that. Ligament needed it, down the leg, but used from hip down. Great toll.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool.pain in leg almost gone. My Ortho. NP encourages me to use it. Those with IT band, it works

customer_reviews.title: Great roller to remove soreness
customer_reviews.text: This roller has removed all of my soreness from exercising. My legs have been sore for two weeks since I have started running long distances. I use it just about every night. I hate that I did not purchase this earlier

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't really helped me with my stiff calf muscles :( maybe it's just too hard and uncomfortable to use??

customer_reviews.title: Great Muscle Roller
customer_reviews.text: Great roller. Wide enough for back & shoulder. I discovered that my cats even like getting rolled. :-)
customer_reviews.author: L. Rothrock

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed product
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. The rollers on this device have small spaces in between them. They move together and apart as you massage your legs, arms, back etc. if you have any hair where you plan on massaging yourself (i.e. legs, arms, etc) this roller will pull your hair causing a painful experience every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Transaction
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and received this product quickly and was able to put it to use right away. It definitely helped my sore muscles as I start my exercise routine again.

customer_reviews.title: This has helped my husband get relief from an angry hamstring!
customer_reviews.text: He likes that he can sit at his desk, stay connected to the computer, and roll away the pain.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Physical Therapy!
customer_reviews.text: The roller is a perfect tool to help with my hip issues. It was similar to the same tool that was used for physical therapy. This product is way cheaper than going to 4-6 weeks of physical therapy.

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs instructions
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Wish it had come with instructions on the best techniques for using it. It's sort of self evident but maybe there is a better or more effective way to roll out sore muscles.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Very comfortable and easy to use. Wide enough to do both legs at one time

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed

customer_reviews.title: Good massage tool
customer_reviews.text: Like the rotating center portion, which makes it easy to use as shown in advertisement. Note that image shows what appears to be a "younger person" using it; a little more difficult to generate the pressure, for older people, to make really effective use of it. Nevertheless, it does do what it claims to do, which is massage muscles which can be easily reached (calf, thigh, neck, lower back). Note that it requires a both-hands grip to function properly, so use on arms or shoulder is difficult.

product_meta.title: Premium Muscle Roller Massage Stick (18") - The Perfect Tool for Sore and Tight Muscles, Relieving Muscle Pain/Soreness, Exercise and Sports Performance, and Increased Flexibility
feature_bullets: ✅ MUSCLE RECOVERY- Significantly helps reduce the negative effects of delayed onset muscle soreness leaving you feeling much better the day after a workout or sporting event.
✅ MUSCLE TIGHTNESS- Works to reduce muscle tightness by loosening and lengthening muscle fibers in problem areas.
✅ EXERCISE PERFORMANCE- Take your warmup to the next level by increasing your blood flow to the “important” parts of your body for your desired activity.
✅ FLEXIBILITY- Significantly lengthen your muscle fibers by using the 9 myofascial trigger point beads to increase your acute and long term flexibility.

✅ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE- We know that you will see significant results from this product. We are so confident that we will offer a full refund if your muscle roller doesn’t meet your specific requirements!
